segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and water is pouring onto the floor, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle of water, yet she remains calm and focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy climbing on the stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and he could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at the boy with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's waiting for him to share a cookie with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still focused on drying that plate, unaware of the potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't tip over and cause an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so patient, just waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed anything yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
